title: 'State Of The Union Machine' Patches Together Speeches Of Presidents Past
teaser: The "State of the Union Machine" randomly generates text based on different presidents' actual speeches. Their words and phrases can be patched together to create a multi-administration text.
contentencoded:
The State of the Union Machine is an online tool that randomly generates text based on different presidents' actual speeches. Nine presidents' words and phrases can be patched together to create a multi-administration text

Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
